put.description: Creates an association between a VM and guest configuration

parameters.name: guestConfigurationAssignmentName
parameters.description: Name of the guest configuration assignment.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update guest configuration assignment.

201.description: Created. The guest configuration assignment for the VM was created successfully.

200.description: OK. The guest configuration assignment for the VM was updated successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get information about a guest configuration assignment

200.description: OK. The guest configuration assignment was returned successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: guestConfigurationAssignmentName
parameters.description: Name of the guest configuration assignment

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all guest configuration assignments for a virtual machine.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all reports for the guest configuration assignment, latest report first.

200.description: OK. This response is due one of these two reasons: 1. Reports were returned successfully 2. Guest configuration assignment was found, but VM is not registered yet, hence no reports returned.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get a report for the guest configuration assignment, by reportId.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: The GUID for the guest configuration assignment report.

200.description: OK. This response is due one of these two reasons: 1. Report was returned successfully 2. Guest configuration assignment was found, but VM is not registered yet, hence no report was returned.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the singleton software update profile for the computer.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: The identifier of the software update

200.description: OK. This response is because the software update profile was found for the computer.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the software updates for a virtual machine.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get a software update on the computer, by softwareUpdateId.

parameters.name: softwareUpdateId
parameters.description: The identifier of the software update

200.description: OK. This response is because the software update was found on the computer.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates an association between a VM and a Software Update Baseline

parameters.name: softwareUpdateBaselineAssignmentName
parameters.description: Name of the software update baseline assignment.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create a software update baseline assignment assignment.

201.description: Created. The software update baseline assignment for the VM was created successfully.

200.description: OK. The software update baseline assignment for the VM was updated successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get information about a software update baseline assignment

parameters.name: softwareUpdateBaselineAssignmentName
parameters.description: The software update baseline assignment name.

200.description: OK. The software update baseline assignment was returned successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Delete a software update baseline assignment

parameters.name: softwareUpdateBaselineAssignmentName
parameters.description: Name of the software update baseline assignment

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all software update baseline assignments for a virtual machine.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates an Software Update Baseline under a resource group

parameters.name: softwareUpdateBaselineName
parameters.description: Name of the software update baseline

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create a software update baseline.

201.description: Created. The software update baseline was created successfully.

200.description: OK. The software update baseline was updated successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get information about a software update baseline

parameters.name: softwareUpdateBaselineName
parameters.description: Name of the software update baseline

200.description: OK. The software update baseline was returned successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: softwareUpdateBaselineName
parameters.description: Name of the software update baseline

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all software update baseline for a resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the software update compliance summary for a virtual machine.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available GuestConfiguration REST API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

value.description: Result of the list guest configuration assignment operation.

GuestConfigurationAssignmentList.description: The response of the list guest configuration assignment operation.

properties.description: Properties of the Guest configuration assignment.

GuestConfigurationAssignment.description: Guest configuration assignment is an association between a VM and guest configuration.

GuestConfigurationNavigation.description: Guest configuration is an artifact that encapsulates DSC configuration and its dependencies. The artifact is a zip file containing DSC configuration (as MOF) and dependent resources and other dependencies like modules.

kind.description: Kind of the guest configuration. For example:DSC

contentUri.description: Uri of the storage where guest configuration package is uploaded.

contentHash.description: Combined hash of the guest configuration package and configuration parameters.

configurationParameter.description: The configuration parameters for the guest configuration.

configurationSetting.description: The configuration setting for the guest configuration.

configurationMode.description: Specifies how the LCM(Local Configuration Manager) actually applies the configuration to the target nodes. Possible values are ApplyOnly, ApplyAndMonitor, and ApplyAndAutoCorrect.

allowModuleOverwrite.description: If true - new configurations downloaded from the pull service are allowed to overwrite the old ones on the target node. Otherwise, false

actionAfterReboot.description: Specifies what happens after a reboot during the application of a configuration. The possible values are ContinueConfiguration and StopConfiguration

refreshFrequencyMins.description: The time interval, in minutes, at which the LCM checks a pull service to get updated configurations. This value is ignored if the LCM is not configured in pull mode. The default value is 30.

rebootIfNeeded.description: Set this to true to automatically reboot the node after a configuration that requires reboot is applied. Otherwise, you will have to manually reboot the node for any configuration that requires it. The default value is false. To use this setting when a reboot condition is enacted by something other than DSC (such as Windows Installer), combine this setting with the xPendingReboot module.

configurationModeFrequencyMins.description: How often, in minutes, the current configuration is checked and applied. This property is ignored if the ConfigurationMode property is set to ApplyOnly. The default value is 15.

ConfigurationSetting.description: Configuration setting of LCM (Local Configuration Manager).

complianceStatus.description: A value indicating compliance status of the virtual machine for the assigned guest configuration.

lastComplianceStatusChecked.description: Date and time when last compliance status was checked.

latestReportId.description: Id of the latest report for the guest configuration assignment.

context.description: The source which initiated the guest configuration assignment. Ex: Azure Policy

assignmentHash.description: Combined hash of the configuration package and parameters.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

value.description: List of reports for the guest configuration. Report contains information such as compliance status, reason and more.

GuestConfigurationAssignmentReportList.description: List of guest configuration assignment reports.

id.description: ARM resource id of the report for the guest configuration assignment.

name.description: GUID that identifies the guest configuration assignment report under a subscription, resource group.

properties.description: Properties of the guest configuration report.

GuestConfigurationAssignmentReport.description: Report for the guest configuration assignment. Report contains information such as compliance status, reason, and more.

complianceStatus.description: A value indicating compliance status of the virtual machine for the assigned guest configuration.

reportId.description: GUID that identifies the guest configuration assignment report under a subscription, resource group.

assignment.description: Configuration details of the guest configuration assignment.

startTime.description: Start date and time of the guest configuration assignment compliance status check.

endTime.description: End date and time of the guest configuration assignment compliance status check.

GuestConfigurationAssignmentReportProper.description: Report for the guest configuration assignment. Report contains information such as compliance status, reason, and more.

name.description: Name of the guest configuration assignment.

AssignmentInfo.description: Information about the guest configuration assignment.

id.description: Azure resource Id of the VM.

uuid.description: UUID(Universally Unique Identifier) of the VM.

complianceStatus.description: A value indicating compliance status of the virtual machine for the assigned guest configuration.

startTime.description: Start date and time of the guest configuration assignment compliance status check.

endTime.description: End date and time of the guest configuration assignment compliance status check.

operationType.description: Type of report, Consistency or Initial

resources.description: The list of resources for which guest configuration assignment compliance is checked.

AssignmentReportDetails.description: Details of the guest configuration assignment report.

complianceStatus.description: A value indicating compliance status of the virtual machine for the assigned guest configuration.

reasons.description: Compliance reason and reason code for a resource.

properties.description: Properties of a guest configuration assignment resource.

phrase.description: Reason for the compliance of the guest configuration assignment resource.

code.description: Code for the compliance of the guest configuration assignment resource.

AssignmentReportResourceComplianceReason.description: Reason and code for the compliance of the guest configuration assignment resource.

SoftwareUpdateProfile.description: The profile of the computer in the context of software updates.

properties.description: Properties of the software update profile subject.

SoftwareUpdateProfileProperties.description: Properties of the software update profile subject.

restartPending.description: Restart pending status of the computer

guestConfigAgentVersion.description: Version of the guest configuration agent

guestConfigAgentStartTime.description: Start time of the guest configuration agent

wsusServer.description: Windows Server Update Services server the computer is connected to

linuxPackageManager.description: Package manager discovered on the computer if it is running Linux

criticalCount.description: Count of updates available classified as critical

securityCount.description: Count of updates available classified as security

otherCount.description: Count of updates available that are classified as neither critical or security

assessmentRuntime.description: Time taken for the latest assessment to complete on the computer

updateAssessmentErrors.description: Errors that occurred during assessment, if any

updateAssessmentErrorStackTrace.description: Stack Trace for any terminal error during assessment, if any

oldestMissingSecurityUpdateInDays.description: Number of days since the oldest missing security update was released

oldestMissingSecurityUpdateBucket.description: 30 day range describing the date of the oldest missing security update

value.description: The collection of software updates found on the computer.

SoftwareUpdatesList.description: The collection of software updates found on the computer.

SoftwareUpdate.description: Describes a specific software update on the given virtual machine.

SoftwareUpdateProperties.description: Properties of the software update object.

availableOnComputerSince.description: Point in time when this update was first seen on this computer

kbid.description: Knowledge Base ID of a Windows Update

publishedDate.description: Reported published date for this update

msrcSeverity.description: Microsoft Security Response Center severity for Windows updates

msrcBulletinId.description: Microsoft Security Response Center bulletin id

SoftwareUpdateBaseline.description: The software update baseline to assign.

properties.description: Properties of the software update baseline.

SoftwareUpdateBaselineProperties.description: Properties of the software update baseline.

windowsBaselineProperties.description: Software update baseline properties for Windows VM.

linuxBaselineProperties.description: Software update baseline properties for Linux VM.

WindowsBaselineProperties.description: Properties of the Windows software update baseline

classifications.description: Software update baseline classification for Windows.

include.description: The include clause for Software update baseline.

exclude.description: The exclude clause for Software update baseline.

LinuxBaselineProperties.description: Properties of the Linux software update baseline

classifications.description: Software update baseline classification for Linux.

include.description: The include clause for Software update baseline.

exclude.description: The exclude clause for Software update baseline.

WindowsSoftwareUpdateBaselineClassificat.description: Software update baseline classification for Windows.

nonCompliantAfterDays.description: Allowed number of days that the software update may be non-compliant.

LinuxSoftwareUpdateBaselineClassificatio.description: Software update baseline classification for Linux.

nonCompliantAfterDays.description: Allowed number of days that the software update may be non-compliant.

SoftwareUpdateBaselineInclude.description: The include clause for Software update baseline.

name.description: Name of the software update that should be compliant.

nonCompliantAfterDays.description: Allowed number of days that the software update may be non-compliant.

SoftwareUpdateBaselineExclude.description: The exclude clause for Software update baseline.

name.description: Name of the software update to exclude from compliance.

SoftwareUpdateBaselineAssignment.description: Software Update Baseline Assignment is an association between a VM and a software update baseline.

properties.description: Properties of the software update baseline.

SoftwareUpdateBaselineAssignmentList.description: List of software update baseline assignments for a given VM.

value.description: List of software update baseline assignment.

SoftwareUpdateBaselineAssignmentProperti.description: Properties of the software update baseline assignment.

id.description: Resource Id of the software update baseline.

baseline.description: Information of the software update baseline.

complianceStatus.description: A value indicating compliance status of the virtual machine for the assigned software update baseline.

lastRefreshDate.description: Last refresh date for the software update baseline assignment.

criticalUpdateCount.description: The number of updates available classified as critical.

securityUpdateCount.description: The number of updates available classified as security.

otherUpdateCount.description: The number of updates available that are classified as neither critical or security.

violatingUpdates.description: The list of software updates that violate the baseline.

properties.description: Properties of the software update compliance summary.

SoftwareUpdateComplianceSummary.description: Software update compliance summry the software update baseline assignment. Report contains information such as compliance status and counts of updates.

SoftwareUpdateComplianceSummaryPropertie.description: Properties for software update compliance summary.

aggregateComplianceStatus.description: A value indicating aggregate compliance status of the virtual machine for the assigned software update baseline.

pendingCount.description: The number of software update baseline evaluation that is in pending state.

compliantCount.description: The number of software update baseline evaluation that is compliant.

nonCompliantCount.description: The number of software update baseline evaluation that is non compliant.

criticalUpdateCount.description: The number of updates available classified as critical.

securityUpdateCount.description: The number of updates available classified as security.

otherUpdateCount.description: The number of updates available that are classified as neither critical or security.
